overview: The stylesheet defines a design system and layout utilities for a healthcare digital experience frontend. It establishes design tokens, responsive grid layouts, typography, accessibility helpers, and base element resets to ensure consistent UI behavior across breakpoints and themes.
key_components: Design tokens (:root variables for color, typography, spacing, shadows, transitions)
Hero, section, and content layout classes
interactions: Hover and focus-visible states for links and buttons
Skip-to-content focus transition for keyboard navigation
data_flow: CSS variables cascade from :root to components
Media queries override layout and spacing at breakpoints
Dark mode overrides color tokens based on user preference
accessibility: High-contrast color tokens for dark mode
analytics: No explicit analytics hooks in CSS; test for presence of data-attributes or JS event bindings in markup
Potential tracking on interactive elements (links, buttons) via external scripts
test_ideas: Verify responsive grid layouts adjust correctly at defined breakpoints
Validate dark mode color tokens apply when prefers-color-scheme: dark is active
Check focus-visible outlines appear on keyboard navigation
Ensure skip-to-content link becomes visible and functional on focus
Confirm consistent typography and spacing across sections
Test hover and disabled states for buttons and links
Validate container max-widths and padding across viewport sizes
